label: Are you a veteran ?

options: I’m not, but my spouse is/was
fields.name: veteran

sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questionHint: Yes: If you have served in the military.No: If you have not served in the military.I’m not, but my spouse is/was: If you are not a veteran, but your spouse has served or is currently serving in the military.Please select the option that best applies      to you.

label: How long did you serve on active duty in the U.S. military, naval, or air service?
sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questionHint: Less than 180 days: If your active duty service was for a period shorter than 180 days.More than 180 days: If your active duty service was for a period of 180 days or longer.Please select the option that best applies to your service duration.

label: Were you discharged or released under conditions other than dishonorable?
sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questionHint: Yes: If you were discharged or released under honorable, general, or other-than-dishonorable conditions.No: If you were discharged or released under dishonorable conditions.Please select 'Yes' or 'No' based on the type of discharge you received

label: Do you have a service-connected disability?

options: Yes, with a disability rating less than 30%
Yes, with a disability rating of 30% or more
fields.name: veteran

sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questionHint: No: If you do not have a disability related to your military service.Yes, with a disability rating less than 30%: If you have a service-connected disability with a rating below 30%.Yes, with a disability rating of 30% or more: If you have a service-connected disability with a rating of 30% or higher.Please select the option that best describes your situation.

label: Could you please select  your date of separation
sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questionHint: Could you please select your date of birth? You can choose the date using the calendar option. Please make sure to enter it in the format MM/DD/YYYY. For example, if your birthday is January 5th, 1990, it should be entered as 01/05/1990.
